speaker: speaker1
text: You didn't ring me last night . You said you would .

speaker: speaker2
text: I'm sorry to have made you disappointed .

speaker: speaker1
text: That's all right . But why were you so rude to me at lunch .

speaker: speaker2
text: Was I ? Sorry , I didn ’ t mean to be . I do apologize .

speaker: speaker1
text: And why are you yarning now ? Are you bored ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Forgive me darling . I'm very tired .
